QuestData.Title: Orders From On High
QuestData.Description: The Adherents of Rukhmar are the ruling body atop the spires. Their influence is absolute. Their proclamations taken as the will of Rukhmar Herself.$B$BThe herald leading this purge is surely carrying out such orders - likely no more than a list of names and places they plan to erase.$B$BThat list would prove invaluable in the days to come. Acquire it for me, and shut that herald up!
QuestData.LogDescription: Loot the Adherent Proclamation from Sun-Sage Rathyx.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Reshad fastens another scroll to Percy, who squawks meekly in protest.>$B$BOh, stop whining.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah yes, there's my name at the top of the list. And a few Talonpriests from the Shadowglade as well.$B$BThey fear the return of Terokk, as they should.
